long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your browser start page with the cheerful Hello Kitty Beach Theme extension! Every new tab features high-definition images of Hello Kitty enjoying sunny beach scenes, adding a touch of fun and relaxation to your browsing experience. Enjoy delightful beach adventures with Hello Kitty, making each new tab a charming and refreshing experience.
This extension allows you to chose your search engine.
